----

One of the easiest ways to load data into R is by entering the data into a comma-separated-values (CSV) file.  The items below link to R Tutorial videos that describe two ways to enter these data and then how to load these data into R.

* [Enter own data (using Excel)](https://vimeo.com/user45324800/ncstats-preparedataexcel)
* [Enter own data (not using Excel)](https://vimeo.com/user45324800/ncstats-preparedatatextfile)
* [Load data into RStudio](https://vimeo.com/user45324800/ncstats-loadcsvrstudio)
